name: Save Room For Veggies
description:
A wave based twin stick shooter game built with love in one week for the 2021 Epic MegaJam. Unhealthy foods chase you around as you try to eat your veggies. Luckily, you can shoot the heck out of them before they hit you.

Supports gamepad play (recommended). 

Controls:

Keyboard+Mouse: W, A, S, D to move. Mouse to aim. Left click to shoot.

Gamepad: Left stick to move, right stick to aim, right trigger to shoot.

Goals:

There are two ways to beat each wave either outlast all the unhealthy attacks or eat all your veggies before your stomach fills up.

GameJam Theme:

The theme of the game jam is "Running out of Space." The theme is mainly reflected in the stomach game mechanic. Additionally, each level gets successively smaller, but that's a secret... 

Development:

Aside from a few free marketplace assets and animations from the game jam sponsors, all game design, programming, art, sound, voice acting was done by Brian Ronan.

This was my first time building a game in Unreal Engine.
